name: Gun FPS: Destroy Enemy
description:
Gun FPS: Destroy Enemy is a strategic FPS game with extreme gun shooting action and critical strike zone. Sharp shooter and an elite commando Shooter, you are assigned different secret missions as you are a spy in black ops to save the world from some terrorists groups. Select your weapon from a large collection of last world war weapons according to the situation and find some cover fire like a boss while shooting at the enemies terrorist force. You are going to love the high-quality graphics and realistic animations like never before in this commando shooting war game.
Features:
- Realistic 3D environment
- Real war scene
- Realistic shooting effect
- Simple and smooth operation
- A variety of powerful weapons
- Challenging mission.
